title: How to Make a Natural Household Fly Spray

steps.headline: In a non-reactive bowl (ceramic or glass), mix all of the ingredients together.
Pour into a clean spray bottle.
Shake the spray bottle well to mix the ingredients.
Label.
steps.description: Date and label the bottle with each of the ingredients plus directions for use.

steps.headline: Use by spraying on body.
steps.description: It is probably wise to do a skin patch test to ascertain any allergic reactions.

steps.headline: Mix the ingredients in a spray bottle.
Shake well to blend.
steps.description: Add water to dilute if you consider this is necessary.

steps.headline: Spray at flies and on surfaces where flies are alighting.
steps.description: Note: This will leave a residue that requires wiping but that's better than having flies annoying you.

text: Body Spray In a non-reactive bowl (ceramic or glass), mix all of the ingredients together.  Pour into a clean spray bottle.  Shake the spray bottle well to mix the ingredients.  Label. Date and label the bottle with each of the ingredients plus directions for use. Use by spraying on body. It is probably wise to do a skin patch test to ascertain any allergic reactions. Room Spray Mix the ingredients in a spray bottle.  Shake well to blend. Add water to dilute if you consider this is necessary. Spray at flies and on surfaces where flies are alighting. Note: This will leave a residue that requires wiping but that's better than having flies annoying you.
